he composite pH value is 11.0, which is calculated by combining the pH values of the alkalinity, hardness, and PO4. The alkalinity has a pH value of 210, hardness has a pH value of 73, and PO4 has a pH value of 1748. By adding these values together, we get a composite pH value of 11.0.
